mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,shipin.shipin_name as shipinName ,shipin.shipin_types as shipinTypes ,shipin.shipin_photo as shipinPhoto ,shipin.shipin_video as shipinVideo ,shipin.shipin_content as shipinContent ,shipin.insert_time as insertTime ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM shipin_collection a left JOIN shipin shipin ON a.shipin_id = shipin.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.shipin_id = #{params.shipinId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and shipin.shipin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shipinName},'%')
and shipin.shipin_types = #{params.shipinTypes}
and shipin.shipin_video like CONCAT('%',#{params.shipinVideo},'%')
and shipin.shipin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shipinContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shipin.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shipin.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
